lead_paragraph: The first trial over a Central Texas gunfight involving rival motorcycle gangs that left nine people dead, 20 others hurt and more than 150 bikers charged is now set for April, 23 months after the 2015 shootout.
snippet: The first trial over a Central Texas gunfight involving rival motorcycle gangs that left nine people dead, 20 others hurt and more than 150 bikers charged is now set for April, 23 months after the 2015 shootout....

headline.main: 1st Biker Trial Over 2015 Waco Shootings Set for April
headline.print_headline: 1st Biker Trial Over 2015 Waco Shootings Set for April
